bug_report.bug_title: Clicking on the Instagram icon on the [About us] page in the footer of the website will take you to the Instagram Home Page (instagram.com)
bug_report.STR: Move down to the page footer
bug_report.AR: The Home Page of Instagram opens
bug_report.ER: The company's page on Instagram opens
bug_report.Author: Anastasiia Chyzhykova
